sentences.en: 'she was aa bitch, " William said.'she was rather buxom. I would call her zaftig. "
sentences.cn: “ 他时母狗中少数的极品. ” 威廉说. “ 他相当丰满,我喜欢叫他丰满而性感的女性. ”

sentences.en: A buxom widow must be either married , buried or shut up in a convent.
He still pictured her as buxom, high - colored, lively and a little blowsy.
sentences.cn: 他心中仍旧认为她身材丰满 、 面色红润 、 生气勃勃、还有点邋遢.

sentences.en: Melissa was a tall, buxom blonde.
sentences.cn: 梅利莎是个丰满的高个子金发美女。

sentences.en: Some are like buxom lassies and others are like slender, poetic, quiet ladies.
sentences.cn: 有的象肥美的少女,有的象纤瘦的 、 有诗意的 、 恬静的贵妇.

sentences.en: The lady on the right is a buxom.
sentences.cn: 右边的那位女士长得略微丰满标致一些.

sentences.en: The Spaniard a buxom widow must be either married, buried, or shut up in a convent.
sentences.cn: 按西班牙人的主张,丰乳肥臀的寡妇应该使之再婚, 或予以埋葬, 不然就关进女修道院里去.

sentences.en: The spaniard a buxom widow must is either marry, bur, or shut up in a convent.
sentences.cn: 按西班牙人的主张,丰乳肥臀的寡妇应该使之再婚, 或予埋葬, 不然就关进女修道院里去.

trans.tran_cn: （妇女）丰满红润的，高大而漂亮的
trans.tran_en: a woman who is buxom is attractively large and healthy and has big breasts
